bug.author: aditya-karampudi
bug.summary: Image dimensions are not captured in xml file after labeling
bug.description:
Hi, The tool is really good and easy to use. But after labeling, in XML file the dimensions of image is missing. The dimensions of the labeled image are being saved but the dimension of image is not being saved. Please refer the screenshot. I am labeling . <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32515662/32836450-d22c5fb4-ca2f-11e7-90f0-49db79a43558.JPG></denchmark-link>
jpg image
OS: Windows 8 PyQt version: 4.12

comments.comment: Does it happen for every image? Do you see any warning or errors in the terminal?
Yes this issue happens for every image and I did not see any warnings in the terminal

Hi, I have reinstalled the whole software and now it is working fine. May be there was an issue while installing Thanks for the awesome and easy to use app <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32515662/33002701-d367b3ec-cddb-11e7-825f-7f5fa5e1310c.JPG></denchmark-link>
